verses.name: Ezekiel 22:7
verses.text: In thee have they set light by father and mother: in the midst of thee have they dealt by oppression with the stranger: in thee have they vexed the fatherless and the widow.

verses.name: Ezekiel 22:8
verses.text: Thou hast despised mine holy things, and hast profaned my sabbaths.

verses.name: Ezekiel 22:9
verses.text: In thee are men that carry tales to shed blood: and in thee they eat upon the mountains: in the midst of thee they commit lewdness.

verses.name: Ezekiel 22:10
verses.text: In thee have they discovered their fathers’ nakedness: in thee have they humbled her that was set apart for pollution.
